text: Praja Shanti Party is an Indian political party in the states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, founded by the noted evangelist K. A. Paul. The party was registered in 2008. Paul said in January 2019 that his party would contest in the 2019 elections in Andhra Pradesh. Its symbol is Helicopter. ==References== Category:Political parties established in 2008 Category:Regionalist parties in India Category:Political parties in India Category:Political parties in Andhra Pradesh Category:2008 establishments in India
title: Praja Shanti Party
